text: Hodokoshi 〔sadaka〕 wa, hinja, konkyu-sha, kore (hodokoshi no jimu) o kanri suru mono, oyobi kokoro ga (shinri ni) katamuite kita mono no tame, mata minoshirokin ya fusai no kyusai no tame, mata arra no michi no tame (ni sossen shite doryoku suru mono), mata tabibito no tame no monodearu. Kore wa arra no ketteidearu. Arra wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru
